messages.content: Hello [ ], this Thursday, [ ], have the power to return a Green MP to parliament. No more MPs can make more of a difference than you can.
The polls, experts and bookies all agree that no single party will win outright. How parties work with each other, or donâ€™t, is important.
You can vote Green confident that our MPs will stand up for what matters. We will never back the Tories and we will push a Labour-led government to go further, to be bolder.
The Greens are the only ones who will stand against austerity, fight for the NHS to remain fully public and ensure urgent action is taken on climate change.
Westminster needs a new Green voice. You can make it happen.

issues.environment: Ensure urgent action is taken on climate change.
issues.health: Fight for the NHS to remain fully public

images.caption: KEEP THE TORIES OUT VOTE GREEN
